[size=5][color=#00ff00]See also:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60931/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D60931&pUp=1]-Ahkrin Nightingale Follower[/url][/size]
_______________________________________________________________________________________
[size=6][color=#ff0000]Description[/color]
[size=5]Ever dreamed of having a possessed  [/size][/size][size=5]follower?[/size]
[size=5] No? Well to bad!
Today you can have[/size] [size=5]your very own full daedric follower![/size]
[size=5]Fell the fear of your enemies when you fight them side to side with this follower![/size]
_______________________________________________________________________________________
[size=6][color=#ff0000]Weapons[/color]
[size=5]Your powerful daedric follow will be armed with nothing more than a daedric sword!YEAH can you feel is power?[/size][/size]
_______________________________________________________________________________________
[size=6][color=#ff0000]Locatcion
[/color][/size][size=5]The follower can be found wondering around on river wood.  [/size]
_______________________________________________________________________________________
[size=6][color=#ff0000]Bugs & Glitches
[/color][/size]Your brand new daedric slave is armed with a vast amount of glitches such as [size=4]None,[size=5]None and [size=6]None!
[size=3]Please report any bugs or glitches you find.[/size][/size][/size][/size]
author: Zenistar
